title: The Crawling Spleen
description: What do you do when science takes things too far? A spleen with an opposable thumb! Oh the humanity!
quote: Sarah, cover your ears so it can’t eat your brains!
altHero: three scientists cower as a spleen with an attached thumb crawls toward them
alt1: three scientists are horrified by what they’ve created
alt2: a spleen with an attached thumb in a vice and electrical equipment
alt3: a male scientist screams, the shadow of the spleen thumb attacking the female scientist in the background
alt4: a closeup of the thumb getting very close to the woman’s ear
